body_html:
Thanks @rmlarsen @drpngx for the review. I am actively looking to fixing the complex issue. I tried to fix the https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py#L215
as mentioned in the review comment.
However, it seems there are other places that needs to be fixed as well and I am still working on it.

For that I think it probably make sense to merge this one first. I can create another follow up PR to address the complex gradients issue once I figure out.

body:
Thanks @rmlarsen @drpngx for the review. I am actively looking to fixing the complex issue. I tried to fix the https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py#L215
as mentioned in the review comment.
However, it seems there are other places that needs to be fixed as well and I am still working on it.

For that I think it probably make sense to merge this one first. I can create another follow up PR to address the complex gradients issue once I figure out.
